attributes.action: Election to the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the PM to change the government's policy so that:
Everyone entitled to vote at a General Election to be entered into a Lottery. People can decline to be entered into the Lottery if they so wish. An agreed number of tickets (e.g. 650) to be drawn out at the same time as the General Election. Those people who have their tickets  drawn can  then serve in the House of Lords for the same duration as the Government serves its office until the next General Election. Their salaries to be the same as MPs. At the next General Election when the members of the House of Lords step down they will be paid a pension, starting immediately, for the rest of their lives, and for the pension to be equal to four times the state pension and tax free.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
